item.title: Help my with yell command
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if(command.startsWith("yell")) { if(playerHasItem(995, 10000000)) { deleteItem(995, 10000000); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "["+playerName+"] : " + command.substring(5); String[] illegalInputs = { "no-ip", "servegame", "www", "www.", ".com", "com", "org", "biz", "net" }; for(String s : illegalInputs) { command.replaceAll(s, "[Censor]"); command.trim(); } } else { sM("You need at least 10 million gp to do this."); } }
Should possibly work?

item.title: Help my with yell command
item.dc:creator: @shadow43 shadow43
item.description:
@shadow43 wrote:

I had founded a yell comand witch blocks some spamers. And i figured out that it would be grate if here would be deleteitem = 995 (10000000) it deltes 10M coins then you write the command. If you don’t have any coins it shud write thatyou don’t have inouth coins. I know where to put a deleteitem but i don’t know where to add }else so help my plz. I fink it would stope ppl flooding by yell and spamers would be not enouth coins to yell

[table][tr][td] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[”+playerName + “] : " + command.substring(5);
}
try {
command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“www”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“www.”, “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(”.com", “[Censor]”);
command.replaceAll(“com”, “[Censor]”);
command.trim();
}[/td][/tr][/table]

Read full topic
